content: I'm not sure to be on the right stream, let me know.

I'd like to specify an alternate prescription in FHIR (for a anticoagulant treatment) like this one : 1 tablet day 1; 0,5 tablet day 2; alterning every other day. Could anyone help me on this? Thank you
